resource_list.title: family-code-Amharic (1).pdf
resource_list.function: Core Statutory Law. Defines Capacity, Establishment, Rights, Duties, Property Regimes, and Grounds for Dissolution (covers FL-01 to FL-12 in the Scope Map). Contains Amharic text. [cite: 2]

resource_list.title: Constitution-of-the-FDRE.pdf
resource_list.function: Sets foundational rights, including Marital, Personal, and Family Rights (Art. 34, 35). Mandates equal rights in marriage and protection of children. [cite_start]Essential for the 'Judge' role's ethical grounding and 'Vulnerable Party' needs (GEP 0.2). [cite: 3]

resource_list.title: Microsoft Word - Federal Supreme Court Decisions Volume 1-3.pdf
resource_list.function: Contains Federal Supreme Court Decisions (Cassation) vital for the 'Cassation-Ready' Research Standard (Pillar I, 1.2). [cite_start]These decisions clarify the application and interpretation of the Family Code, acting as critical 'Grounding Nodes' for the LRG. [cite: 1]
